chi.title: 开源软件供应链点亮计划--暑期2022
titlebannertext: 开源软件供应链点亮计划鼓励大家关注开源软件和开源社区，致力于培养和发掘更多优秀的开发者。<br class="displaynone"/><br class="displaynone"/>活动将在暑期进行，我们将与开源社区紧密合作，<br class="displaynone"/>提供一对一的导师指导，邀请技术大牛开展线上免费讲座。
bannertext: 我们鼓励研究人员、开源爱好者、在校师生参与开源软件的开发与维护，促进开源软件的发展和优秀开源软件社区建设，<br  class="displaynone"/>增加开源项目的活跃度，推进开源生态的发展。
bannerone: 暑期2022 活动于3月15日启动，社区报名窗口已开启， 查看详情
学生注册窗口于3月底开启， 查看详情
4月9日社区开始上线项目， 查看详情
icontext: 给你的编程能力加个 buff
结识更多的小伙伴和技术大牛
将为您匹配资深的社区导师
您将获得活动荣誉奖杯和奖金奖励

en.title: Summer 2022 of Open Source Promotion Plan
titlebannertext: Open Source Promotion Plan encourages everyone to pay close attention to open source software and open source community, aiming to cultivate and explore more outstanding developers.
bannertext: ‘Summer 2022’ will be held in the summer. We will collaborate closely with the open source community to provide one-to-one mentor guidance and invite some specialists to deliever free online lectures. <br  class="displaynone"/>We encourage researchers , open source enthusiasts, teachers as well as students to participate in the development and maintenance of open source software in order to promote the development of open source software in China and facilitate the construction of excellent open source software community.Furthermore,‘Summer 2022’could promote the activity of open source projects in China, even integrate the system into the wolrd.
bannerone: Summer 2022 starts on March 15, Oragnization Application is open. APPLY
Student Registration will open at the end of March. Register
Organization can release projects on April 9. See Details
icontext: Make the acquaintance with big gun and friends!
Matched you with senior community mentors!
Obtain the award and trophy with your achievements!
